class_g_05_home_01: Put away your phones. It is time to begin class.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_02:
Though some of you had to retake the midterm
exam multiple times, I am glad to say that the\r
majority of the class passed without issue.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_03:
I feel honored to see that the knowledge and
skills indispensable for daily life have taken root\r
in all of you.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_04:
I trust that you will all work just as hard on your
life skills in this second half of our course as well.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_05:
Let us now turn our attention to the topic of the
day, which was inspired by a question I received\r
on the subject of Meal Powers.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_06:
The student who asked this question is a young
man who enjoys the culinary arts.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_07:
He tells me that he regularly researches culinary
techniques on his own and pays careful attention\r
to the ingredients he uses.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_08:
He also spends day and night studying all aspects
of the culinary arts.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_09:
Yet despite this, he is baffled by his inability to
increase the effectiveness of his Meal Powers.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_10:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So tell me, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)],
since\r
you\r
did\r
quite\r
well\r
on\r
your\r
midterm\r
exam...[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_11:
What should Ar—ahem, this young man—do to
increase the effectiveness of his Meal Powers?[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_select_01: He should make food more often
class_g_05_select_02: He should make food with other people
class_g_05_home_answer_01:
The culinary arts are not so easily grasped.
Simply engaging in them more often will not\r
necessarily reward you with success.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_answer_02:
Perfectly correct. I see that you are
knowledgeable about the culinary arts.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_answer_03:
Ahem... I cannot disclose the identity of this
certain male student who enjoys the culinary arts.\r
It may very well be Arven, but it may not be![VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_12:
To increase the effectiveness of Meal Powers,
your sandwiches must be filled with many\r
different ingredients.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_13:
For a single person, this may prove difficult. But
if you prepare a sandwich with others, you will\r
be able to handle a larger serving of bread.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_14:
With a larger base to start with, it becomes quite
simple to add more ingredients to your sandwich.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_15:
Which, in turn, makes it possible to receive Meal
Powers of increased effectiveness.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_16:
This applies more broadly as well. When dealing
with a difficult issue, working with others to solve\r
that issue may be the best course of action.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_17:
I am sure that Arven will likewise work with
friends to craft his sandwiches in the future.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_18:
Ahem... The identity of the male student is a
matter of privacy, so I would ask that you do not\r
pry too deeply.[VAR 0114(0029)]
class_g_05_home_19:
Our time together has come to an end for today.
I bid you all farewell.[VAR 0114(0029)]
